By: Rand Fishkin May 27, 2005 Live Q+A with Jim Lanzone of Ask Jeeves at Cre8asite Mobile SEO The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Jim Lanzone, the senior vice president of search properties for Ask Jeeves/Teoma, whom Mike Grehan previously interviewed with Apostolos Gerasoulis, is giving a live Q+A in the cre8asiteforums today. Several members (myself included) have already posed a few early questions and I expect that Jim, who's been very forthcoming in the past, will provide some excellent replies. Copied! Back to Top
